Flesh

Logo

Overview

Flesh is a styling framework designed to be simple to implement and easy to customize. Used as is, Flesh has a clean tpyographic reset, sane form styling, and a basic flat visual style. Utilizing the various base styles can help speed up the process of conceptualizing a site design. Building on these base styles, one can easily design a complex visual design suitable for production sites. There are several levels to Flesh:

  • Layout
  • Typography
  • Forms
  • Makeup

Layout

Bla bla bla, information on core layout styling and such.

Typography

Lots of work to do with typography. Needs to be lean, mean, and clean! Figure out a good baseline, stick to a common font-stack, etc.
